channel.title: Dragon Age: Inquisition
channel.description:
I made a RPG topic here last year over the first two games and I recently acquired the third in the series Dragon Age: Inquisition
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662237.msg4426239.html#msg4426239
I wanted to make a topic solely for this one just because...well this i a gem of a game it really is. It has multiplayer ( which sadly you have to grind or spend sh so bad on you bioware!) but the graphics are beautiful (for bioware/for the RPG series )
A lot of new features in it and overall is very solid.
